dcterms:creator: E. Calvano
G. Calzolari
V. Denicolo
J. E. Harrington Jr
S. Pastorello
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the effects of AI on collusive pricing behavior, highlighting the risks associated with algorithmic pricing in competitive markets.

dcterms:creator: E. Calvano
G. Calzolari
V. Denicolo
S. Pastorello
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the relationship between artificial intelligence, algorithmic pricing, and collusion, providing empirical evidence and theoretical insights.

dcterms:creator: S. Assad
R. Clark
D. Ershov
L. Xu
dcterms:description: This dataset provides empirical evidence from the German retail gasoline market, analyzing the impact of algorithmic pricing on competition and collusion.

dcterms:creator: T. Klein
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates autonomous algorithmic collusion using Q-learning under sequential pricing, contributing to the understanding of collusion dynamics in markets.

dcterms:creator: L. Waltman
U. Kaymak
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the behavior of Q-learning agents in a Cournot oligopoly model, providing insights into competitive dynamics and collusion.

dcterms:creator: J. P. Johnson
A. Rhodes
M. Wildenbeest
dcterms:description: This dataset explores platform design in the context of pricing algorithms used by sellers, analyzing the implications for competition and collusion.

dcterms:creator: G. Brero
E. Mibuari
N. Lepore
D. C. Parkes
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on learning strategies to mitigate AI collusion on economic platforms, providing insights into competitive behavior.

dcterms:creator: I. Ruhmer
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes platform collusion in two-sided markets, contributing to the understanding of competitive dynamics in such environments.

dcterms:creator: G. Tan
J. Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the effects of competition and entry in multi-sided markets, providing insights into market dynamics and collusion.

dcterms:creator: C. Chica
Y. Guo
G. Lerman
dcterms:description: This dataset explores competition and collusion in two-sided markets with an outside option, providing insights into market behavior.
